cast.overview: Superman, a journalist in Metropolis, embarks on a journey to reconcile his Kryptonian heritage with his human upbringing as Clark Kent.
cast.title: Superman

details.biography: Grace Chan was born in San Diego, CA, but was raised in Hong Kong for 10 years along with the influence of her Australian mother. She began dancing at the age of 3, training in ballet, jazz, contemporary, hip hop, pointe, and musical theatre styles. Grace attended Pace University in 2018 to study Commercial Dance, and after working in the professional dance industry for 4 years, she began to shift her focus to her acting career. She has since then worked on major feature films and commercials.
details.name: Grace Chan
